thread.title: Weekend visit was awesome!
thread.title_full: Weekend visit was awesome! - Review of Roger Smith Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: mccammon2017
title: Weekend visit was awesome!
text:
My son and I wanted a weekend getaway from Washington DC. We 27-year old son was in charge of logistics - I said - something convenient, decent, and under $200/night. He found your hotel, and it was great! Convenient location, nice people, great rooms, everything we could ask for. Great restaurants all around, and walking distance to lots of museums, shows, Central Park.
Room Tip: It was very quiet.... See more room tips
